answers.answer: Are you timing your contractions? I would say since your baby is already at weight it could be anytime. Start timing them and call l&d. Good luck!

question: Today I lost a huge chunk of my mucus plug. And now I have had lower back pains on and off and quite a few contractions. Anyone else have that? And how long was it before you went into labor? I will be 36 weeks Saturday. But I have gestational diabetes and he's huge already. Weighing in at 7lbs 8 ounces. And my doc said he has a lot of amniotic fluid and he's measuring two weeks ahead which can cause early labor.
title: Loss of mucus plug followed by contractions
